live_updates: Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 23:00.Please stay tuned for updates
40635.summary: Some customers in the Lawson Heights area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40635.title: Aug 15 – Saskatoon (Lawson Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
